name: ABBYSON_LIVING_Jackson_Ivory_Leather_Foldable_Futon_Sofa_Bed
reviews: although it looks very nice, it is not a comfortable as a bed. Because the seats go up and down on either end it is very hard in the middle, which may be difficult for some peoples back. I suggest using a padded cover when using as a bed.
description:
This practical and contemporary futon-sofa is the ideal versatile
furniture for your home. It has a very simple and easy to use
design that can be turned into a bed with ease. Features split back adjustable mechanismsSeat and back cushion made of high density foam, convoluted
  foam, polyesterTufted seating and backMaterials: PU leather, wood, chrome legsUpholstery materials: PU leatherUpholstery color: IvoryFinish: Chrome legsSeat dimensions: 16 inches high x 23.5 inches deepBed depth: 43 inchesDimensions: 32 inches high x 71 inches wide x 34 inches
  deepStyleContemporaryMaterialFaux LeatherTypeSofaThickness7 InchAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorWhite
